nodes.title: The Pave Ashley
nodes.description: Classic and elegant, The Pave Ashley engagement ring is a beautiful low profile engagement ring. Four delicate prongs allow the center stone to float gracefully above a shimmering band of diamonds. It's a brilliant pave engagement ring designed to capture the light of the center stone, that can be visible from all angles.

optionsFromMetafields.value: {"Center Stone Shape":["Round","Oval","Pear","Cushion","Elongated Cushion","Emerald","Radiant","Princess","Marquise"],"Material":["14k White Gold","14k Yellow Gold","14k Rose Gold","18k White Gold","18k Yellow Gold","18k Rose Gold","Platinum"],"Style":["Solitaire","Pave"]}

nodes.title: Double Prongs
nodes.descriptionHtml: Similar to the single claw prongs but two prongs sit closely next to each other for extra protection.

nodes.title: 2mm Pave Band
nodes.descriptionHtml: Customize the band's width to your preference.

nodes.title: Euro Shank
nodes.descriptionHtml: A modern squared base for comfortable, stylish wear.

nodes.title: Pave Prongs
nodes.descriptionHtml: Add extra sparkle to your setting with diamonds on the prongs.

nodes.title: 75% Around
nodes.descriptionHtml: Extend the diamonds on the band to go 75% around it.

nodes.title: All Around
nodes.descriptionHtml: Extend the diamonds on the band — all around.

nodes.title: 2.5mm Pave Band
nodes.descriptionHtml: Customize the band's width to your preference.

nodes.title: 6 Prongs (Round)
nodes.descriptionHtml: Add extra protection to the center stone with 6 prongs.

nodes.title: East West
nodes.descriptionHtml: Turn the center stone horizontally for a fresh, unique look.

nodes.title: Pave 3D
nodes.descriptionHtml: Upgrade the band to have diamonds on 3 sides of the band.

nodes.title: Reverse Tapered Pave
nodes.descriptionHtml: A striking fusion of contemporary allure and bold design, with intricately set diamonds along a widening band.

nodes.title: Tapered Pave
nodes.descriptionHtml: Delicately set diamonds along a gracefully narrowing band.

nodes.title: The Eve
nodes.description: The Eve is our soft and sumptuous diamond solitaire ring with a bamboo band. This design is meant to symbolize strength and fertility in an undeniably attrdraft, nature-loving piece. The center stone of your preference is securely held by four claw prongs, reigning over a gorgeous hidden halo.

optionsFromMetafields.value: {"Center Stone Shape":["Round","Oval","Pear","Cushion","Elongated Cushion","Emerald","Radiant","Princess","Marquise","Asscher"],"Material":["14k White Gold","14k Yellow Gold","14k Rose Gold","18k White Gold","18k Yellow Gold","18k Rose Gold","Platinum"]}

nodes.title: 2mm Band
nodes.descriptionHtml: Customize the band's width to your preference.

nodes.title: Double Prongs
nodes.descriptionHtml: Similar to the single claw prongs but two prongs sit closely next to each other for extra protection.

nodes.title: Two-Tone
nodes.descriptionHtml: Create a unique look by mixing two metals. The head will be made in white gold and the band in your chosen metal.

nodes.title: Euro Shank
nodes.descriptionHtml: A modern squared base for comfortable, stylish wear.

nodes.title: Pave Prongs
nodes.descriptionHtml: Add extra sparkle to your setting with diamonds on the prongs.

nodes.title: 2.5mm Band
nodes.descriptionHtml: Customize the band's width to your preference.

nodes.title: Low Profile
nodes.descriptionHtml: The center stone is set close to the band, offering a sleek and practical design. A straight wedding band won’t fit with the ring.

nodes.title: 6 Prongs (Round)
nodes.descriptionHtml: Add extra protection to the center stone with 6 prongs.

nodes.title: Tapered
nodes.descriptionHtml: A sleek, modern twist with a narrowing band that accentuates the center stone.

nodes.title: Remove Hidden Halo
nodes.descriptionHtml: Remove the feature of smaller diamonds underneath the center stone (The setting design won’t change).

nodes.title: East West
nodes.descriptionHtml: Turn the center stone horizontally for a fresh, unique look.

nodes.title: Compass
nodes.descriptionHtml: A compass prong setting has four prongs aligned with the cardinal directions, highlighting the stone's beauty.

nodes.title: Bezel
nodes.descriptionHtml: A bezel setting surrounds the stone with a metal rim, providing a secure and modern look.

nodes.title: Reverse Tapered
nodes.descriptionHtml: Bold elegance with a widening band that creates a captivating and distinctive look.

nodes.title: The Jasmine
nodes.description: The Jasmine is a vintage style masterwork of luxury and delicacy. The art-deco design features milgrain detailing, a pattern of oval and round-shaped frames, and diamonds running the semi-band. A classy piece fit for heirloom jewelry that stays in the family for generations.

nodes.title: The Maia
nodes.description: The low-profile Maia's center stone sits flush with a luxurious hidden halo, keeping the ring discrete and practical. A slender, 1.5mm band adds visual size to the center stone while slenderizing the finger. A high-polish finish gives the ring a clean, luxurious look.

nodes.title: The Pave Lexie
nodes.description: The Pave Lexie is designed for those who appreciate the finer things in life, seamlessly blending contemporary design with classic brilliance. The band is adorned with a constellation of meticulously set pave diamonds that capture the light, illuminating your center stone and enhancing its brilliance. This pave setting creates an uninterrupted flow of sparkle, making it an epitome of sophistication and grace. Every glance at The Pave Lexie is a reminder of the intricate details that make up life's most cherished moments.

nodes.title: The Luna
nodes.description: The Luna is a stunning solitaire with petal prongs that delicately embrace the center stone, giving it a touch of nature-inspired charm. The graceful lines and subtle curves allow the diamond to shine with an unparalleled luminosity, reflecting both the light and the depth of your commitment. Whether you choose a classic round cut or a more contemporary shape for your stone, The Luna always catches the eye and showcases the beauty of your love.

nodes.title: The Lily
nodes.description: The Lily is a solitaire engagement ring that embodies pure simplicity and timeless grace. Featuring petal prongs that gently cradle the center diamond, this design draws inspiration from the delicate beauty of a blooming flower. The Lily allows the stunning diamond to take center stage, unadorned and beautifully prominent, while the petal-like prongs add a touch of organic elegance. The clean lines and sleek band provide a perfect backdrop for the diamond, offering a delicate balance that complements any hand.

nodes.title: The Lisa
nodes.description: Introducing The Lisa, a solitaire engagement ring that epitomizes elegance and grace. This stunning piece features delicate petal prongs adorned with exquisite marquise and round-cut accent diamonds, creating an opulent cradle for the center stone. The intricate design captures the essence of natural beauty, making The Lisa a breathtaking choice for your unforgettable moment.

nodes.title: The Mia
nodes.description: Introducing The Mia engagement ring, a dazzling blend of elegance and brilliance. This exquisite piece features a high-polish band adorned with clustered diamond accents, creating a breathtaking sparkle that perfectly highlights the center stone. The Mia's hidden halo adds an extra layer of shimmer, enhancing the ring's beauty from every angle. With its impeccable design and radiant charm, The Mia is the perfect symbol of your enduring love and commitment.

nodes.title: The Liv
nodes.description: Introducing The Liv engagement ring. Quality craftsmanship, Deco sensibilities, and timeless aesthetics meet in this three-stone tapered baguette ring. The slender band elongates the finger while adding visual size to the claw-set center stone. The side baguettes add size, sparkle, and geometry to the side stone. Designed to shine in all directions while turning heads.

nodes.title: The Charlotte
nodes.description: Meet The Charlotte- sleek, stylish, and subtle. This captivating bezel-set engagement ring embodies the strength and resilience of true love. The metal frame enclosing the center stone comes with a little secret: a strip of pave-set diamonds. The band is lined with additional accents for a breathtaking but practical everyday piece.

nodes.title: The Skyler
nodes.description: The Skyler engagement ring is a celebration of love’s daring beauty, designed for the modern bride who dreams boldly and loves deeply. Its sleek band sweeps upward in an elegant embrace, cradling the claw-set center stone in a breathtaking bypass setting that symbolizes two paths coming together as one. Uniquely crafted with passion and artistry, The Skyler is a timeless promise, a radiant reflection of your extraordinary love story, and a symbol of the future you’ll build together.

nodes.title: The Pears Liv
nodes.description: Introducing The Pears Liv engagement ring, a coveted design that exudes timeless elegance and sophistication. This three-stone masterpiece features exquisite teardrop diamonds on its shoulders, perfectly complementing the stunning center stone. The Pears Liv is the epitome of stunning yet understated beauty, ideal for those who appreciate classic style with a modern twist.

nodes.title: The Kelsey
nodes.description: Adorned with a split shank band, The Kelsey captivates with its intricate design and timeless glamor. The shoulders are embellished with dazzling marquise diamonds, gracefully enhancing its allure. The true brilliance of this engagement ring, however, lies in the marquise diamonds, which radiate an exquisite sparkle, symbolizing the eternal love shared by two souls. The Kelsey is the perfect embodiment of timeless beauty, destined to be cherished for a lifetime and even beyond.

nodes.title: The Pave Alison
nodes.description: Introducing The Pave Alison, a breathtaking solitaire that perfectly balances glamor and understated elegance. With a slim pave band that shimmers in the light and delicate petal prongs, this ring is the epitome of sophistication. While the pave setting adds an extra layer of brilliance, drawing the eye to the diamond and creating an ethereal aura, the modest design emphasizes its size and glittery beauty. Embrace the timeless style of The Pave Alison, a piece that will make heads turn wherever she goes.

nodes.title: The Amber
nodes.description: The Amber is a gorgeous engagement ring in an ornate-style setting, decorated with romantic milgrain detailing and additional engraving on the ring's head. An esthetic choice that combines the fine details of a vintage ring with the comfort of a smooth-polish solitaire band.

nodes.title: The Crown Kamellie
nodes.description: The Crown Kamellie is a classy solitaire ring that has modesty and exuberance. Its smooth, polished band looks good matched with eternity rings and wedding bands. Four delicate prongs hold the center stone in place while a hidden crown adds luster from the side and from below.

nodes.title: The Pave Eleanor
nodes.description: Introducing The Pave Eleanor, the perfect engagement ring for those who appreciate timeless elegance with a modern touch. The modest design of this exquisite pave emphasizes the size and glittery beauty of the diamond, making it the center of attention. With The Pave Eleanor, you can show off your love with a ring that is both refined and distinctive. It's the ideal choice for the modern woman who wants to make a statement with a classic and sophisticated piece of jewelry.

nodes.title: The Halo Twig
nodes.description: Embrace the enchantment of nature with The Halo Twig, an engagement ring that combines earthly elegance with a celestial sparkle. The band, beautifully crafted to mimic a twisted twig, features accent diamonds while a halo surrounds the center stone, creating a luminous effect that dances with light. The balance between the natural-inspired band and the ethereal glow of the diamonds resonates with those who find romance in nature's elegance.

nodes.title: The Pave Eliza
nodes.description: The Pave Eliza blends modern style with dazzling brilliance. This half-bezel engagement ring cradles your center stone with sleek, curved lines, creating a look that's both bold and sophisticated. The pave band adds a radiant sparkle, with shimmering diamonds accentuating every movement. Perfect for those who want a ring that’s as unique as their love, The Pave Eliza is a striking choice that leaves a lasting impression.

nodes.title: The Pave Kamellie
nodes.description: Introducing The Pave Kamellie, a shimmering engagement ring with a modern twist. This stunning piece combines the elegance of a classic design with a delicate pave-set band while a sparkling hidden halo adds an extra layer of brilliance without overpowering the ring's simplicity. For those seeking an engagement ring that blends tradition with a touch of unexpected glamor, The Pave Kamellie offers the perfect balance of beauty and sophistication.

nodes.title: The Hidden Halo Penelope
nodes.description: The Hidden Halo Penelope engagement ring is a masterpiece of elegance and detail. This extraordinary ring features a micro pave hidden halo and dazzling diamond accents that grace its shoulders. Six round-cut diamonds elegantly adorn the shank, creating a brilliant display that catches the light from every angle. The center stone is flawlessly claw-set, ensuring it remains the focal point of this stunning design. The Hidden Halo Penelope is perfect for those who appreciate meticulous craftsmanship and timeless beauty. * For small finger sizes, two diamonds will flank each side.
